values: The devil is a powerful evil spirit in some religions.
The church promised protection from the devil.
n. 魔鬼；撒旦；家伙；恶棍；淘气鬼；冒失鬼 vt. 虐待，折磨；（用扯碎机）扯碎；（替作家，律师等）做助手；抹辣味料烤制或煎煮

To devil is to cook or prepare food, especially eggs or meat, with spices or other hot ingredients.
The devil is a supernatural being often associated with evil or mischief.
